channel.title: Books on Joe Jean | Software Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Joe Jean | Software Engineer

item.title: My method for finding the best books on any topic of
item.description: I recently read an article about the importance of Computational Thinking. It is important because it helps you think about ways you can use computers to solve problems – something that the knowledge of a programming language’s syntax does not necessarily provide. So, I decided to read a good book about the subject. But first, I had to find the book. In what follows, I will explain how I went about finding a great Computational Thinking book using Amazon and users’ feedback.
